attributes.action: All Drivers & Motorcyclists should train for, and pass an Advanced Driving Test at a prescribed level within 3 years of obtaining a full driving licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently, new drivers and motorcyclists have no incentive to continue to learn the skills necessary to be safer on British roads. Some will want to become better drivers but the majority will still drive to a standard below what is required on today's busy road network. By giving 3 years to complete this, new drivers would have a clear objective and it would be attainable as they gain experience

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
